text: Smarana karuna, yakhana allah‌ balalena, ‘he ‘isa! Niscaya ami apanake parigrahana karaba [1], amara nikata apanake uthiye niba [2] ebam yara kuphari kare tadera madhya theke apanake pabitra karaba. Ara apanara anusariganake keyamata paryanta pradhan'ya diba, tarapara amara kache'i tomadera pratyabartana. ’ Atahpara ye bisaye tomadera matantara ghateche ami tomadera madhye ta mimansa kare deba
